cause.description:
A non-profit organization aiming at transcending the Levant in to a region with potential prosperity. This can be done through projects that tackle the illiteracy problem, loss of identity, communal divisions and lack of societal bonds.
1. Eradicate Illiteracy and Promote Development
2. Create Societal Bonds Outside Familial Relations
3. Religious Fundamentalism, Sectarianism, Tribal Prejudice Should be ERADICATED
cause.name: Protect the Levant
